1267970.name: The Last Crusade
1267970.description:
Choose your army from a diverse set of units, each with their own strengths and weaknesses.
Just remember - this is a one way trip and any soldier you lose can't be replaced in the field.





Use everything at your disposal to push through the Undead tide. Explosives, Magic and Artillery will reduce your foes to messy chunks and carve a path into the unknown.



The remnants of humanity have cowered behind wall for 100 years, ever since darkness swept the lands. Now it is time to reclaim what was taken, to venture out and face death itself before mankind withers away into nothing.

In The Last Crusade you control bands of troops as you explore, scavenge and fight your way through a continent lost to time and death. Each expedition will bolster your capabilities and allow you to delve further into these lost lands. Rediscover a persistent world where the only means of traversal is slogging through connected maps and relentless hordes of undead. Upgrade your castle, the last bastion of humanity, recruit new and powerful allies and push back the undead.

Your troops are willing to lay down their lives for a better tomorrow, make sure the sacrifice isn't in vain.
1267970.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
